document.full_text: there is no evidence pakistani officials knew osama bin laden was living at a compound deep inside the country, but the united states is not ruling out the possibility, president barack obama's counterterrorism adviser said on tuesday.
document.title: no proof pakistanis knew bin laden location: u.s.
lines_and_colors: there is no evidence pakistani officials knew osama bin laden was living at a compound deep inside the country, but the united states is not ruling out the possibility, president barack obama's counterterrorism adviser said on tuesday.
